name: Live Music with Richlybent!
description: Bring your dancin' shoes and join us for wine and live music with Richlybent singing R&B & Motown! Wines will be available by the glass and bottle and Fijian BBQ Food available for purchase. Open seating available. No outside alcohol.

name: Live Music at Wood Family Vineyards
description: Music is from 6pm-8:30pm  Wine by the bottle and glassFull food menu Preferred seating reservations offered through website

name: Holy McGrail Quarterly Wine Club Release Party
description: Join us for a beautiful summer weekend on the Front Lawn at McGrail to toast to the season and unveil our newest release wines! Indulge your senses as you sip and savor our 2023 Peyton Paige Sauvignon Blanc, 2022 Malbec, 2021 Clone 30 Cabernet Sauvignon, and 2018 Graduate Cabernet Sauvignon.
price: Wine Club Members receive up to four complimentary tickets per membership. Guests are $25/person. Guests under 21 years of age or Non-Drinkers are $5/person.

name: Imagination Expressed 2024
description: Our annual collaboration with PAL showcases the latest works from talented local artists. The exhibit displays works in a wide variety of media including painting, watercolor, colored pencil, photography, printing, ceramics, painted porcelain, and jewelry.

name: Winnie the Pooh KIDS
description: The Pleasanton Youth Theater Company is proud to present Disney’s Winnie the Pooh KIDS - a delightful show based on the beloved characters of A.A. Milne and the 2011 Disney animated feature film. Featuring favorite songs from the film, as well as new hits by the Academy Award-winning Robert

name: Live Music at Dust Bowl Brewing Co
address: 3034 W. Jack London Blvd. Livermore, CA 94551
description: Live music from Maddy Hudson! Get ready to experience the soulful melodies and captivating lyrics of Maddy Hudson as she takes the stage for an unforgettable live music performance! With her dynamic voice and heartfelt performances, Maddy effortlessly weaves together elements of folk, pop, and blues, creating a unique.

name: Mother’s Day Wine, Brunch & Bouquets!
description: Celebrate Mother’s Day in the Livermore Valley Wine Country! Treat Mom to a special day of wine tasting, brunch and a beautiful bouquet of flowers. Each ticket includes a wine tasting flight at each of the participating wineries, a delicious brunch and a beautiful bouquet of flowers. Tickets are $55 per person and include wine tasting at each of the participating wineries, brunch and a bouquet of flowers.

name: Tacos & Trivia at BottleTaps
description:
Put your knowledge to the test and join us at BottleTaps for an evening of Trivia and Tacos! Can't get a babysitter? No problem! We are a family friendly establishment, so pack up the family and head on over. Don't want to leave the dog at home? We allow dogs on the patio so Fluffy can enjoy a bowl of water while you enjoy some of our delicious tacos! We have prizes for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trivia winners. We recommend that parties of 6 or more call ahead of time for a reservation.

With 30 beers, meads, ciders and kombuchas on tap, and a rotating menu of tacos, BottleTaps is your to-go spot for tacos AND trivia on Tuesday! Cheers!

name: Acoustic Wednesday
description: Join us for Acoustic Wednesday with live music by Matt Finders and Friends. Enjoy a glass of wine and relax in our beautiful tasting room or on our patio. We have a great selection of wines to choose from and a beautiful view of the vineyards. We also have a food truck on site from 5-8pm. Come out and enjoy the evening with us!
